title: Moses, Pharaoh, Power, and Uncircumcised Lips
description:
Moses and Aaron go to Pharaoh and fail. Pharaoh is smug, the Israelites are angry at Moses and Moses is angry with God. In response to this God gives Moses a genealogy. Moses is not the hero of his own story. Who is? 



Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU
